verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician אַל־ תַּשְׁחֵת֮ <WH516> Altaschith לְדָוִ֪ד <WH1732> of David מִ֫כְתָּ֥ם <WH4387> Michtam בִּשְׁלֹ֥חַ <WH7971> sent שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> when Saul וַֽיִּשְׁמְר֥וּ <WH8104> and they watched אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֝בַּ֗יִת <WH1004> the house לַהֲמִיתֽוֹ׃ <WH4191> to kill him הַצִּילֵ֖נִי <WH5337> Deliver מֵאֹיְבַ֥י ׀ <WH341> me from mine enemies אֱלֹהָ֑י <WH430> O my God מִּמִתְקוֹמְמַ֥י <WH6965> me from them that rise up תְּשַׂגְּבֵֽנִי׃ <WH7682> defend
הַ֭צִּילֵנִי <WH5337> Deliver מִפֹּ֣עֲלֵי <WH6466> me from the workers אָ֑וֶן <WH205> of iniquity וּֽמֵאַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH582> men דָ֝מִ֗ים <WH1818> me from bloody הוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃ <WH3467> and save

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֪ה <WH2009> behold אָֽרְב֡וּ <WH693> For lo they lie in wait לְנַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> for my soul יָג֣וּרוּ <WH1481> are gathered עָלַ֣י <WH5921> against עַזִ֑ים <WH5794> the mighty לֹא־ <WH3808> nor פִשְׁעִ֖י <WH6588> against me not [for] my transgression וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor חַטָּאתִ֣י <WH2403> nor [for] my sin יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> O LORD

בְּֽלִי־ <WH1097> no עָ֭וֹן <WH5771> themselves without [my] fault יְרוּצ֣וּן <WH7323> They run וְיִכּוֹנָ֑נוּ <WH3559> and prepare ע֖וּרָה <WH5782> awake לִקְרָאתִ֣י <WH7125> to help וּרְאֵה׃ <WH7200> me and behold

וְאַתָּ֤ה <WH859> O יְהוָֽה־ <WH3068> Thou therefore O LORD אֱלֹהִ֥ים ׀ <WH430> God צְבָא֡וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel הָקִ֗יצָה <WH6974> awake לִפְקֹ֥ד <WH6485> to visit כָּֽל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> all the heathen אַל־ <WH408> not תָּחֹ֨ן <WH2603> be not merciful כָּל־ <WH3605> to any בֹּ֖גְדֵי <WH898> transgressors אָ֣וֶן <WH205> to any wicked סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah
יָשׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> They return לָ֭עֶרֶב <WH6153> at evening יֶהֱמ֥וּ <WH1993> they make a noise כַכָּ֗לֶב <WH3611> like a dog וִיס֥וֹבְבוּ <WH5437> and go round about עִֽיר׃ <WH5892> the city

הִנֵּ֤ה ׀ <WH2009> Behold יַבִּ֘יע֤וּן <WH5042> Behold they belch out בְּפִיהֶ֗ם <WH6310> with their mouth חֲ֭רָבוֹת <WH2719> swords בְּשִׂפְתוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <WH8193> [are] in their lips כִּי־ <WH3588> For מִ֥י <WH4310> Who שֹׁמֵֽעַ׃ <WH8085> for who [say they] doth hear

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> O יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> But thou O LORD תִּשְׂחַק־ <WH7832> shalt laugh לָ֑מוֹ תִּ֝לְעַ֗ג <WH3932> in derision לְכָל־ <WH3605> all גּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> at them thou shalt have all the heathen
עֻ֭זּוֹ <WH5797> [Because of] his strength אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> about אֶשְׁמֹ֑רָה <WH8104> will I wait כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> upon thee for God מִשְׂגַּבִּֽי׃ <WH4869> [is] my defence

אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> The God [חַסְדֹּו כ] (חַסְדִּ֣י <WH2617> favour ק) יְקַדְּמֵ֑נִי <WH6923> shall prevent אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> me God יַרְאֵ֥נִי <WH7200> shall let me see בְשֹׁרְרָֽי׃ <WH8324> [my desire] upon mine enemies

אַל־ <WH408> not תַּהַרְגֵ֤ם ׀ <WH2026> Slay פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> or יִשְׁכְּח֬וּ <WH7911> forget עַמִּ֗י <WH5971> them not lest my people הֲנִיעֵ֣מוֹ <WH5128> scatter בְ֭חֵילְךָ <WH2428> them by thy power וְהוֹרִידֵ֑מוֹ <WH3381> and bring them down מָֽגִנֵּ֣נוּ <WH4043> our shield אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <WH136> O Lord

חַטַּאת־ <WH2403> [For] the sin פִּ֗ימוֹ <WH6310> of their mouth דְּֽבַר־ <WH1697> [and] the words שְׂפָ֫תֵ֥ימוֹ <WH8193> of their lips וְיִלָּכְד֥וּ <WH3920> let them even be taken בִגְאוֹנָ֑ם <WH1347> in their pride וּמֵאָלָ֖ה <WH423> and for cursing וּמִכַּ֣חַשׁ <WH3585> and lying יְסַפֵּֽרוּ׃ <WH5608> [which] they speak

כַּלֵּ֥ה <WH3615> Consume בְחֵמָה֮ <WH2534> [them] in wrath כַּלֵּ֪ה <WH3615> consume וְֽאֵ֫ינֵ֥מוֹ <WH369> may be no וְֽיֵדְע֗וּ <WH3045> [them] that they [may] not [be] and let them know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> that God מֹשֵׁ֣ל <WH4910> ruleth בְּיַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> in Jacob לְאַפְסֵ֖י <WH657> unto the ends הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the earth סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

וְיָשׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> let them return לָ֭עֶרֶב <WH6153> And at evening יֶהֱמ֥וּ <WH1993> [and] let them make a noise כַכָּ֗לֶב <WH3611> like a dog וִיס֥וֹבְבוּ <WH5437> and go round about עִֽיר׃ <WH5892> the city

הֵ֭מָּה <WH1992> like [יְנוּעוּן כ] (יְנִיע֣וּן <WH5128> continually ק) לֶאֱכֹ֑ל <WH398> for meat אִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֥א <WH3808> are not יִ֝שְׂבְּע֗וּ <WH7646> if they be not satisfied וַיָּלִֽינוּ׃ <WH3885> and grudge

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <WH589> I אָשִׁ֣יר <WH7891> But I will sing עֻזֶּךָ֮ <WH5797> of thy power וַאֲרַנֵּ֥ן <WH7442> yea I will sing aloud לַבֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> in the morning חַ֫סְדֶּ֥ךָ <WH2617> of thy mercy כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָיִ֣יתָ <WH1961> have been מִשְׂגָּ֣ב <WH4869> for thou hast been my defence לִ֑י וּ֝מָנ֗וֹס <WH4498> and refuge בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day צַר־ <WH6862> of my trouble לִֽי׃

עֻ֭זִּי <WH5797> Unto thee O my strength אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> about אֲזַמֵּ֑רָה <WH2167> will I sing כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> for God מִ֝שְׂגַּבִּ֗י <WH4869> [is] my defence אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> [and] the God חַסְדִּֽי׃ <WH2617> of my mercy
